creator: genix@list.ru
text:
Transcode.transcode method doesn't convert svg to pdf with this exception:

org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException: null
Enclosed Exception:
The current document is unable to create an element of the requested type
(namespace: http://www.w3.org/2000/svg, name: flowRoot).
	at org.apache.batik.transcoder.XMLAbstractTranscoder.transcode(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.batik.transcoder.SVGAbstractTranscoder.transcode(Unknown Source)
	at svg2pdf.engine.SVG2PDF.convertSVG2PDF(SVG2PDF.java:81)
	at svg2pdf.main.Test.main(Test.java:18)

This svg file created with corel draw

creator: genix@list.ru
text:
Created attachment 20541
test svg

exported from corel svg file

The document needs to have a version="1.2" attribute on the root <svg> element
for <flowRoot> to be recognised.
creator: cam@apache.org
